text: nam'muṭe dūtanmār lūtvinṟe aṭuttetti. appēāḷ avaruṭe varavil addēhaṁ vallāte viṣamiccu. ēṟe paribhramikkukayuṁ manas's tiṭuṅṅukayuṁ ceytu. avar paṟaññu: "pēṭikkēṇṭa. duḥkhikkukayuṁ vēṇṭa. tīrccayāyuṁ ninneyuṁ kuṭumbatteyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷ rakṣappeṭuttuṁ. ninṟe bhāryayeyeāḻike. avaḷ pinmāṟininnavaril peṭṭavaḷāṇ
